biotools.summary: AlignMe (for Alignment of Membrane Proteins) can be used to examine detailed similarity between homologous proteins even if there is no notable sequence similarity. The predefined gap/weight sets have been optimized for membrane proteins, and so should be particularly useful for these difficult cases.
